Dating: 18TH DYNASTY (not before); AMENHOTEP IV/AMENOPHIS IV/NEFERKHEPERURE/AKHENATEN (not after)
Name: Fragment of bracelet
Description: A fragment from a finely worked bracelet, inscribed with the early forms of the names of the Aten, Akhenaten and Nefertiti. Although the five cartouches are quite worn they are still legible and the bracelet was a delicate piece of jewellery.
